thread.title: Wanna find Nemo? You may need SoFi the robotic fish

title: Wanna find Nemo? You may need SoFi the robotic fish
text:
Wanna find Nemo? You may need SoFi the robotic fish 12:16pm GMT - 00:58 
Scientists from Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) have created a remote-controlled robot that swims through coral reefs and schools of fish, using a fisheye lens to capture high-resolution photos and video. Jim Drury reports.   
Scientists from Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) have created a remote-controlled robot that swims through coral reefs and schools of fish, using a fisheye lens to capture high-resolution photos and video. Jim Drury reports.  //reut.rs/2IG7lQK
